Description:
The FHIR MedicationStatement resource defines detailed information about medications being consumed by a patient. This includes medication prescriptions, OTC drugs ordered in an ambulatory clinic, and medications reported by a patient. The medication information may come from e.g. the patient's memory, from a prescription bottle, or from a list of medications the patient, clinician or other party maintains and therefore is often, if not always, less specific than the MedicationOrder resource.

The search interaction enables the client to query for all medications associated with a given patient's medication list. The client, having established the patient in question, now wishes to retrieve the list of that patient's medications.

</Bundle>

_id.Name: _id
_id.Description: The FHIR resource ID of an individual MedicationStatement resource. If specified, other search parameters are ignored.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The FHIR resource ID of the linked patient.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the order. If a status is not provided in the search, then only medications with an active status are returned. This is to avoid end user confusion and protect patient safety.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

MedicationStatement.Name: MedicationStatement
MedicationStatement.Description: An instance of the DSTU2 MedicationStatement resource.

dosage.Name: dosage
dosage.Description: The value and unit of the dosage.

asNeededBoolean.Name: asNeededBoolean
asNeededBoolean.Description: True if taken as needed (PRN). False otherwise.

route.Name: route
route.Description: The route where the medication is taken.

effectiveDateTime.Name: effectiveDateTime
effectiveDateTime.Description: The effective date and time when the patient started taking the medication.

effectivePeriod.Name: effectivePeriod
effectivePeriod.Description: The effective dates and times when the patient started and stopped taking the medication.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: The identifier associated with the MedicationStatement.

informationSource.Name: informationSource
informationSource.Description: Reference to the source of information. Can include reference to a Patient, Practitioner, or RelatedPerson.

medicationReference.Name: medicationReference
medicationReference.Description: The medication ID unless it is a mixture.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The order status of the medication.
